import { useState, useEffect } from "react" const BOT = () => { const [text,setText] = useState('') const [post,setPost] = useState([]) //Process each lines of text-area function handleTextArea(event){ setText(event.target.value) } function combined(){ const lines = text.split('\n').filter(line => line.trim() !== ''); setPost(lines) } function output(){ combined() } return (
Facebook BOT

) } export default BOT;
